name: Returned of the Tistina
desc: If this card is in your hand: You can target 1 "Tistina" monster you control, except "Returned of the Tistina"; Special Summon this card, and if you do, its Level becomes that targeted monster's Level. If this card is in your GY: You can target 1 Aqua Xyz Monster you control; attach this card to it as material. You can only use each effect of "Returned of the Tistina" once per turn.
